summary: The sequel to Jagarna (1996), the film concerns Erik who is asked to return to his hometown in Sweden to solve a brutal murder. Although hesitant to go back due to unfavourable memories of ... See full summary »
cast: Rolf Lassgård|Peter Stormare|Annika Nordin|Kim Tjernström|Lo Kauppi|Jesper Barkselius|Eero Milonoff|Johan Paulsen|Ellenor Lindgren|Olov Häggmark|Jonas Hedlund|Yngve Dahlberg|Juho Milonoff|Elina Knihtilä|Michael Odhag|Sofie Kalla|David Lindblom|Tove Olsson|Emil Henriksson|Oskar Larsson|Robert Larsson|Jocke Nilsson|Simon Nilsson|Martin Sundbom|Håkan Andersson|Jarl Lindblad|Hanna Ek|Catherine Parment|Charlotte Lindmark|Gunnar Eklund|Lennart Jähkel|Niklas Larsson|Anders Lindgren|Carl-Gustav Fornelid|Richard Zachari
title: Jägarna 2
